title: Apple has revealed a Passwords app vulnerability that lasted for months
description: Apple fixed a bug in the iOS 18.2 Passwords app that, for three months starting with the release of iOS 18, made users vulnerable to phishing attacks, according to an Apple security content update spotted by 9to5Mac. Here’s how Apple describes the bug and its…

title: The name doesn’t matter (that much)

title: I've visited celebrity-loved ski towns in Italy and Colorado. Here's where to go if you want to feel like an A-lister without breaking the bank.
description: Aspen, Colorado, and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy, attract celebrities and wealthy travelers. I've visited both and prefer the more affordable ski town.

title: The Worm That No Computer Scientist Can Crack
description: One of the simplest, most over-studied organisms in the world is the C. elegans nematode. For 13 years, a project called OpenWorm has tried—and utterly failed—to simulate it.

title: Kate says nature is family's 'sanctuary' in Mother's Day message
description: The Princess of Wales has frequently reflected on the comfort the natural world has brought her in recent months.
